TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {225928=Biocon is in the Pharmaceuticals sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 9,012.00 crore. The company management includes Kiran Mazumdar Shaw - Chairperson & Managing Director, John Shaw - Vice Chairman, Arun Chandavarkar - Joint Managing Director & CEO, Charles L Cooney - Director, Mary Harney - Director, Bala S Manian - Director, Ravi Mazumdar - Director, Suresh N Talwar - Director, Peter Bains - Director, Russel Walls - Director, Catherine Rosenberg - Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532523 and the NSE with an NSE Code of BIOCON. Its Registered office is at 20th K M, Hosur Road, Electronic City P O, Bangalore,Karnataka - 560100.
